comment: This file specifies the secret abilities (augments) which will be added to the player on character creation.
For example, some secret abilities are not available through normal means of progress and came from special events.
This file contains an array of uint which specify the ability id. Reference the enum SecretAbility in SecretAbility.cs
for a mapping of skill to id. By default this file adds the special battle BGM for Monster Hunter, Devil May Cry,
Ghosts 'n Goblins, Street Fighter and Megaman
